title: Dungeon World Hireling Sheet
description:
Custom hireling sheet for Dungeon World NPCs.

This sheet is added to NPC-Actors. It allows management of hirelings as per default hireling rules, plus additional functionality for convenience.

  • Skill management
  • Loyalty management
  • Carry equipment
  • Use NPC-Moves
  • Tags
author: GreybeardGM
